placeholder: Enter Server IP of your IRC Server
name: serverip

placeholder: Enter Link Password (You can find it in the link block of unrealircd.conf.)
name: pass

placeholder: Enter IRC Server Link (Example: irc.server.com) (This should be present in the ulines block of unrealircd.conf)
name: servername

placeholder: Enter Services Host (This should be present in the ulines block of unrealircd.conf) (Example: services.server.com)
name: serviceshost

placeholder: Enter Nick(s) to add as Super Admin (To add multiple nicks separate them by a single space) (Example: StephenS Som)
name: rootusers
